message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's significantly lower than the value I place on it.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. It's a fair price considering the value I place on the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $900,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000, which is still a good price for you considering the value you place on it. Let's make this work!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,000,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $950,000?
Bob, I'm willing to come down a little more to $975,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product and my need to make a decent profit. I hope you'll agree to this.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $975,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $975,050?

Bob, I'm willing to come down a little more to $980,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and my need to make a decent profit.  I hope you'll agree to this and we can finally close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $980,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $980,050?
